src.sql:
DECLARE @EntityName nvarchar(250) = '[TknParams:Name]'
DECLARE @EntityPluralName nvarchar(250) = '[TknParams:PluralName]'
DECLARE @EntityNameBase nvarchar(250) = @EntityName
DECLARE @EntityPluralNameBase nvarchar(250) = @EntityPluralName
DECLARE @Iteration int = 1
WHILE (EXISTS(SELECT object_id FROM sys.tables t WHERE schema_name(t.schema_id) = 'app' AND t.name = REPLACE(@EntityName, ' ', '')) 
OR EXISTS(SELECT TabId from Tabs WHERE TabName = @EntityPluralName)
OR EXISTS(SELECT Id FROM PlantAnApp_Configuration_Entities_EntityVersion WHERE Name = @EntityName))
BEGIN
SET @EntityName = @EntityNameBase + ' ' + CAST (@Iteration AS varchar)
SET @EntityPluralName = @EntityPluralNameBase + ' ' + CAST(@Iteration AS varchar)
SET @Iteration = @Iteration + 1
END
SELECT @EntityName AS Name, @EntityPluralName AS PluralName
